posts.description: #HairBesties, I can't live without my PERM. I live for the texture it gives my naturally straight hair. I am gonna perm my hair for the rest of my life now lol. I am glad I found my new hair girl to do it for me, along with her assistants @hairbyjoohee @ha._____.eun @amin__2da now I have someone in LA. Yay! The best part is they are also huge @guytang_mydentity  Haircolor users too so you can go get your hair color done by them and request for #mydentity color. Thank you to my hair guy @nam_studio who cuts my hair too. This perm technique is from #korea so it's rare to find someone in the US who does the Iron Perm. Do you HairBesties love my hair Permed or straight?üòçüòçüòç @create_professionel

Hello all HairBesties! I made a visual chart here to help explain @guytang_mydentity colors in RoseGold. Rose Gold perception is different in everyone's eyes. Some see it warmer and some see it cooler and some see it as Pink! Both models on the chart were done with the same formulas but on two different starting levels. #mydentity 7rg is the cooler side of Rose which appear more violet(to some)when wet until dry then you will see the Rose tone. If applied to a level 10 bleached hair it will appear more on the cooler side but when applied to a level 8 will appear on the warmer side. 9rg is a soft creamy rose gold but look how it will appear different on a level 10 over a level 9. It's part of the color wheel and let's embrace the many variations of #RoseGold, 10Rg is a lot more pink because it's in the permanent color category design to lift and control underlying tones while blushing the hair with an iridescent Rose reflection., if you put 10rg permanent on bleached level 10 hair, you will get Pink because there is no background to support the delicate Rose Gold effect but hey if you like pink then go for it! But some see pink as fuschia and some see it as magenta. We can't expect Rose gold to be one tone because there are many variations. Here is the formula on the 2 models with two different starting levels.
Rootag√©: 7rg demi with 6vol
Formula 2: 7rg+9rg with 6vol 
Formula 3: 9rg with 6vol 
Process on dry hair for 25mins 
Mix 1:2 for acidic gloss or 1:1 for opacity and 5min low heat option and 20min cool down helps longevity. You can also add #mydentity Pink Glow booster to increase the pink vibrancy to your formula! Have fun and share! I love you HairBesties #HB4L

HairBesties, have you use @guytang_mydentity ColorMAX dual boosters to amplify your Silvers, Lavenders and Rose Golds? This is what it does. Tutorials are on my YouTube channel. You can blend vibrant colors with soft colors all in one process. Mix it in your demi color to amp up the vibrancy and shear them out with the new Crystal Clear‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è @hairbynoora @lisamitrov @almarqt @cksullivan14 @guytang_mydentity @arianasin

Two of my beautiful models in Athens, Greece. Guy Tang World Tour with @olaplex using @guytang_mydentity color #BIG9 to prelighten.
Male model: #mydentity 8ss + Crystal Clear with 6vol on his level 10 lifted hair on rootag√© and added more Crystal Clear to remaining formula and add more 6vol 1:2 ratio to dilute pigment for his ends.
Female model:#mydentity 9rg demi on rootag√© with 6vol and 9rg with Crystal Clear with 6vol on the ends. Deposit on level 10. The clear allows for shear results on level 10 hair. @olaplex @guytang_mydentity @arianasin @denisearussell @edolaplex @marine_kon @leo.matis @guytangmydentityteam

Hello all HairBesties, Always remember that true success comes from happiness and embracing who we are so we can have that courage and confidence to be ourselves. Be free from judgements. It doesn't matter your race, your gender, or how society wants us to be. Never let anyone bring you down. Mydentity is about being YOU and celebrating YOU! I love you HairBesties! Every move I make is for us, our HairBesties community! 
The Love for the Silver Smoke series and new Crystal Clear in @guytang_mydentity colors is LIFE! 
6ss, 8ss, 10ss and Crystal Clear #mydentity colors is a must have weapon in your color arsenal! Thank you to my team @arianasin @hairbynoora @michkovach @ajennalene_rush @guytang_mydentity @guytangmydentityteam

HairBesties, most of us know chlorine is every hair color worst nightmare especially blondes and Silvers. My client Angie went for a little swim and came out a little green. I decided to clarify and treat with Olaplex and gave her a new look using 7Rg  with crystal clear demi in @guytang_mydentity 
Formula 1: 7Rg #mydentity demi with 6vol and Olaplex 
Formula 2: 25g 7Rg demi and 25g crystal clear with 6vol and Olaplex 
Formula 3: 15g 7Rg and 35g crystal Clear and 6vol with @olaplex 
Process 25 mins and voila
Crystal Clear is coming to your stores at @armstrongmccallofficial and @cosmoprofbeauty in May and online now. Keep in mind the 7Rg can be mauve looking on a Level 10 and this is how I got the mauve result, I love it@guytang_mydentity @guytangmydentityteam @angiexlee @arianasin

HairBesties, one of my favorite prismatic look on my Model Lisa. I used my favorite @guytang_mydentity #Big9 
To lift her hair to a level 10 and went in to deposit with #mydentity demi
Formula 1: 6ss with 6vol 1:2
Formula 2: 8ss with 6vol 1:2
Formula 3 10ss with Crystal Clear 6vol 1:2
Next step after shampoo and blowdry
I layered in @guy_tang #mydentity Vibrant Pastels
Formula 1: Pink Diamond
Formula 2:Arctic Blue+Charcoal+ Olaplex no2
Formula 3: Lavender Lust
Formula 4: Charcoal
Thank you to my team @arianasin @hairbynoora @lisamitrov @cksullivan14 @guytangmydentityteam
